goal.ch: 介紹機率與統計的原理以及在工程上的應用

content.ch:
1.Probability Theory (機率理論)
2.Random Variables (隨機變數)
3.Probability Distributions (統計分配)
4. Estimation (統計推定)
5.Tests of Hypotheses (假設檢定)

textbook.en: “Applied Statistics for Engineers and Scientists. 3rd Edition. Jay L. Devore, Nicholas R. Farnum, Jimmy A. Doi. 工程統計(Modern Engineering Statistics). Lawrence L. Lapin著, 潘南飛、溫志中編譯. 工程統計學：原則與應用(修訂版). J. Susan Milton, Jesse C. Arnold. 吳榮彬 譯. A Modern Introduction to Probability and Statistics [electronic book] by F.M. Dekking, C. Kraaikamp, H.P. Lopuhaa? L.E. Meester. Springer, 2005. 應用統計學. 徐世輝 著.“
textbook.ch: “Applied Statistics for Engineers and Scientists. 3rd Edition. Jay L. Devore, Nicholas R. Farnum, Jimmy A. Doi. 工程統計(Modern Engineering Statistics). Lawrence L. Lapin著, 潘南飛、溫志中編譯. 工程統計學：原則與應用(修訂版). J. Susan Milton, Jesse C. Arnold. 吳榮彬 譯. A Modern Introduction to Probability and Statistics [electronic book] by F.M. Dekking, C. Kraaikamp, H.P. Lopuhaa? L.E. Meester. Springer, 2005. 應用統計學. 徐世輝 著.“

ch.competency: 具備運用數學、科學、工程知識以及現代化工具解決工程領域問題之能力

ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習 ， 口頭報告/口試
